frontmatter.title: Why Dashboards Don't Deliver (and What Actually Does)
frontmatter.short: Most teams drown themselves in dashboards and call it transparency. But visibility isn't clarity. Learn why dashboards fail and what decision architecture can do instead.
frontmatter.keywords: dashboards, decision architecture, data visibility, business intelligence, organizational clarity, data-driven decisions
frontmatter.hero_alt: Why Dashboards Don't Deliver and What Actually Does

mdx.excerpt: Most teams drown themselves in dashboards and call it “transparency.” Every morning starts the same: open the dashboard, scan the charts…
